EmailTemplate.description: Notification sent to the running User when a GRAX Restore process finishes
EmailTemplate.name: GRAX Restore Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: GRAX Restore Process Has Finished
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.FirstName},
The GRAX Restore process with Unique Key: [[GRAX_Execution_Unique_Key]] has finished. Below, you can read the results summary:
[[GRAX_Restore_Summary]]
Click the following link for more details: [[SOURCE_HOST]]/grax-app/grax-data-lake/generateRestoreSummary/[[GRAX_Execution_Unique_Key]]?orgid=[[ORG_ID]].
